summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to an providing for the defeasance of release by anticipatory marshaling of the claim or lien of the outstanding bonds of certain City consolidated local improvement districts; providing for transfer of money and investments and investing or reinvesting the same to accomplish the defeasance; conditionally authorizing the execution of a trust agreement; and providing for the transfer of certain money to the appropriate funds of the City, all in accordance with the defeasance provisions of the several bond authorizing ordinance.
